original:

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
混乱していない味方を優先して指定し、対象が味方ならマッチ威力 +10, ダメージ量が常時0に固定
対象の[Laceration]3につき、マッチ威力 +1(最大3)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
흐트러지지 않은 아군을 우선으로 지정하며, 대상이 아군이면 합 위력 +10, 피해량이 항상 0으로 고정
대상의 [Laceration] 3당 합 위력 +1 (최대 3)
EN:
Prioritize an unstaggered ally. If the target is an ally, gain Clash Power +10, and fix the damage to 0 at all times
Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on the target (max 3)

original:
[WhenUse] 自分の[FestivalFever]5または対象の[Laceration]6につき、最終威力 +1(最大4)
[WhenUse] [Laceration]が15未満なら、[Laceration]15を得てから即1回発動させて[Laceration]回数が1減少(体力が10%未満なら[Laceration]・[Laceration]回数を得る効果のみ発動)
[EndSkill] [BloodDinner]を15消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] 自分の[FestivalFever]5または対象の[Laceration]6につき、最終威力 +1(最大4)
[WhenUse] [Laceration]が15未満なら、[Laceration]15を得てから即1回発動させて[Laceration]回数が1減少(体力が10%未満なら[Laceration]・[Laceration]回数を得る効果のみ発動)
[EndSkill] [BloodDinner]を15消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] 자신의 [FestivalFever] 5 또는 대상의 [Laceration] 6당 최종 위력 +1 (최대 4)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]이 15 미만이면, [Laceration] 15를 얻은 다음 즉시 1회 발동시키고 [Laceration] 횟수 1 감소 (체력이 10% 미만이면 [Laceration], [Laceration] 횟수를 얻는 효과만 발동)
[EndSkill] [BloodDinner] 15 소모
EN:
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every 5 [FestivalFever] on self or every 6 [Laceration] on the target (max 4)
[WhenUse] At less than 15 [BloodDinner], gain 15 [Laceration] and immediately trigger it once, then reduce [Laceration] Count by 1 (at less than 10% HP, activate only the part of this effect where this unit gains [Laceration] Potency and Count)
[EndSkill] Consume 15 [BloodDinner]

original:
[CantIdentify]
メインターゲットは敵、サブターゲットは味方を優先して指定し、対象が味方ならマッチい威力 +10, ダメージ量が常に0に固定
[WhenUse] 自分の[BloodDinner_Accumulation]20につきマッチ威力 +1(最大10)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]が25未満なら、[Laceration]25を得てから即1回発動させ、[Laceration]回数が1減少(体力が10%未満なら[Laceration], [Laceration]回数を得る効果のみを発動)
[EndSkill] [BloodDinner]を25消耗
[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]を全て消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[CantIdentify]
メインターゲットは敵、サブターゲットは味方を優先して指定し、対象が味方ならマッチい威力 +10, ダメージ量が常に0に固定
[WhenUse] 自分の[BloodDinner_Accumulation]20につきマッチ威力 +1(最大10)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]が25未満なら、[Laceration]25を得てから即1回発動させ、[Laceration]回数が1減少(体力が10%未満なら[Laceration], [Laceration]回数を得る効果のみを発動)
[EndSkill] [BloodDinner]を25消耗
[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]を全て消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[CantIdentify]
메인 타겟은 적, 서브 타겟은 아군을 우선으로 지정하며, 대상이 아군이면 합 위력 +10, 피해량이 항상 0으로 고정
[WhenUse] 자신의 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] 20당 합 위력 +1 (최대 10)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]이 25 미만이면, [Laceration] 25를 얻은 다음 즉시 1회 발동시키고 [Laceration] 횟수 1 감소 (체력이 10% 미만이면 [Laceration], [Laceration] 횟수를 얻는 효과만 발동)
[EndSkill] [BloodDinner] 25 소모
[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]를 전부 소모
EN:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes enemies for its main target, and prioritizes allies for its sub-targets. If the target is an ally, Clash Power +10 and always fix the damage to 0.
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 20 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit (max 10)
[WhenUse] At less than 25 [BloodDinner], gain 25 [Laceration], immediately trigger it once, then lose 1 [Laceration] Count (at less than 10% HP, activate only the part of this effect where this unit gains [Laceration] Potency and Count)
[EndSkill] Consume 25 [BloodDinner]
[EndBattle] Consume all [FestivalFever]

original:

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[FestivalFever]に比例し、次のターンまで[AttackUp]1, [DefenseUp]1を付与([FestivalFever]3につき1付与、それぞれ最大3)

EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [AttackUp] and [DefenseUp] until next turn based on [FestivalFever] (1 per 3 [FestivalFever], max 3 of each)

original:
[WhenUse] 自分の[BloodDinner_Accumulation]20につきマッチ威力 +1(最大10)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]が50未満なら、[Laceration]25, [Laceration]回数2を得てから即2回発動させ、[Laceration]回数が2減少(体力が10%未満なら[Laceration], [Laceration]回数を得る効果のみを発動)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を半分だけ消耗
[EndBattle] [IncompleteParade]を全て消耗
[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] 自分の[BloodDinner_Accumulation]20につきマッチ威力 +1(最大10)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]が50未満なら、[Laceration]25, [Laceration]回数2を得てから即2回発動させ、[Laceration]回数が2減少(体力が10%未満なら[Laceration], [Laceration]回数を得る効果のみを発動)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を半分だけ消耗
[EndBattle] [IncompleteParade]を全て消耗
[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10を得る
<CMT_KR>오식: "[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10「」得る" 정확: "[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10「を」得る"
<CMT_EN>Typo: "[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10「」得る" Correction: "[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10「を」得る"
<CMT_JP>誤植: "[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10「」得る" 訂正後: "[EndBattle] [FestivalFever]10「を」得る"
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] 자신의 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] 20당 합 위력 +1 (최대 10)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]이 50 미만이면, [Laceration] 25, [Laceration] 횟수 2를 얻은 다음 즉시 2회 발동시키고 [Laceration] 횟수 2 감소 (체력이 10% 미만이면 [Laceration], [Laceration] 횟수를 얻는 효과만 발동)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 절반만큼 소모
[EndBattle] [IncompleteParade]를 전부 소모
[EndBattle] [FestivalFever] 10 얻음
EN:
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 20 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit (max 10)
[WhenUse] At less than 50 [BloodDinner], gain 25 [Laceration], +2 [Laceration] Count, immediately trigger it twice, then reduce [Laceration] Count by 2 (at less than 10% HP, activate only the part of this effect where this unit gains [Laceration] Potency and Count)
[WhenUse] Consume half of [BloodDinner]
[EndBattle] Consume all [IncompleteParade]
[EndBattle] Gain 10 [FestivalFever]

[DefeatDuel] 피해량이 50%만큼 감소하고 이 스킬의 피해로 대상이 흐트러지지 않음
[EndSkill] 정신력 -45로 감소

[WinDuel] Deal +([BloodDinner] consumed by this Skill)% damage (max 150%)

[EndSkill] This unit's SP drops to -45
